last_episode_to_air.name: Her Resolve, and...
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Shino suddenly announces that she's transferring schools. She has a huge fight with Saki, who isn't convinced, but Shino still can't confess her feelings.

But it was Rika who gave her the encouragement she needed. Rika had sent Naoya a message asking him to join her at Shino's private beach.

Confronting Naoya and Saki again, Shino tearfully confesses her feelings for him. How will Naoya and Saki respond to Shino's big confession...?!

And what will the relationship between Naoya and Saki, Saki, Nagisa, Rika, and Shino be...?!

name: Girlfriend, Girlfriend
overview: Naoya Mukai has loved Saki Saki since grade school, and when she finally accepts his feelings, he's at his happiest. But one day, a cute girl named Nagisa Minase confesses to him! Not wishing to choose only one over another, Naoya chooses to go out with both of them!! What will be of this love triangle that challenges morality itself?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Naoya Mukai is having the time of his life after his childhood friend Saki Saki finally accepts one of his countless confessions. Ensuring that their relationship will stay strong, he spares no effort in showering affection to his now beloved girlfriend.

However, one afternoon, another girl named Nagisa Minase suddenly confesses to Naoya following months of preparation. Even though he politely rejects her, Nagisa's irresistible charm and determination continue to attract Naoya. Wanting to fulfill both Saki and Nagisa's desires, Naoya ends up proposing a crazy idea—to date the two of them simultaneously, with both girls fully aware. This unprecedented state of affairs ultimately causes wacky and hilarious situations in whatever they do to keep their unusual relationship going.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Following their trip to the hot springs, Naoya decides to continue his two-timing relationship with Saki and Nagisa, and will treat them fairly. Add to the mix, Mirika who kissed him first, and Shino who has a secret crush on Naoya. The stage is set for the five lovebirds as summer vacation arrives. Fireworks, camping, and then to Okinawa... Mirika's younger sister, Risa, also makes an appearance. The neo-standard love comedy gets more and more exciting!
